name: Marcus Thorne
content: In a world of endless emails, Deal Scale's AI-personalized direct mail letters get noticed. We've re-engaged several high-net-worth leads who were unresponsive digitally. The quality and personalization are top-notch.
problem: Reaching ultra-high-value, busy individuals who ignore most digital communication was a major challenge for our luxury segment.
solution: Strategically sent, beautifully printed and AI-personalized letters via Deal Scale have opened doors that emails and calls couldn't. It adds a level of prestige and seriousness.
